channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Data Protection Search
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Data Protection Search

item.title: CVE-2024-22433|2024-02-06T06:22:17.378Z -- dell -- data%20protection%20search
item.description: Dell Data Protection Search 19.2.0 and above contain an exposed password opportunity in plain text when using LdapSettings.get_ldap_info in DP Search. A remote unauthorized unauthenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability leading to a loss of Confidentiality, Integrity, Protection, and remote takeover of the system. This is a high-severity vulnerability as it allows an attacker to take complete control of DP Search to affect downstream protected devices.
